wordGroup: in totality 全体；整体；全部；完全

sentences.en: The seriousness of the situation is difficult to appreciate in its totality.
sentences.cn: 很难从全局上理解局势的严重性。

sentences.en: Of fulfilling that promise in totality.
Even the most developed mind cannot understand the totality of life.
sentences.cn: 即便是最高深的思想也不能理解生活的全部。
